CustomField.formula: IF(AND(OR(CreatedBy.Alias = 'autocase',zz_Recipient_First_Mail__c = 'shop@trustedshops.com'), OR(CONTAINS(Subject, "Automatische Antwort:"), CONTAINS(Subject, "Delivery Status Notification (Failure)"), CONTAINS(Subject, "Undelivered Mail Returned to Sender"), CONTAINS(Subject, "Abwesend:"), CONTAINS(Subject, "Abwesend"), CONTAINS(Subject, "Abwesenheit"), CONTAINS(Subject, "Abwesenheit/ out of office"), CONTAINS(Subject, "(Autoresponder) Abwesenheitsmeldung / Out of office"), CONTAINS(Subject, "Automatic Reply:"), CONTAINS(Subject, "Automatic reply:"), CONTAINS(Subject, "AUTO:"), CONTAINS(Subject, "Automatisch antwoord:"), CONTAINS(Subject, "Abwesenheitsnotiz"), CONTAINS(Subject, "helpdesk"), CONTAINS(Subject, "Out of office"), CONTAINS(Subject, "Out of Office"), CONTAINS(Subject, "out of office"), CONTAINS(Subject, "Autoreply"), CONTAINS(Subject, "AUTOREPLY"), CONTAINS(Subject, "Vielen Dank für Ihre Nachricht!"), CONTAINS(Subject, "Automatyczna odpowiedź"), CONTAINS(Subject, "Réponse automatique"), CONTAINS(Subject, "Bericht ontvangen!"), CONTAINS(Subject, "Support-Ticket geöffnet"), CONTAINS(Subject, "TEST - intern onboarding"), CONTAINS(Subject, "TEST - extern onboarding"), CONTAINS(Subject, "TEST - intern activation"), CONTAINS(Subject, "TEST - extern activation"), CONTAINS(Subject, "Spam Quarantine Report") )), true, false)
CustomField.label: Subject Filtered?
